word: God says that the health reform in our midst is not what it ought to be. There is backsliding on this point. God has given us light in regard to how we should live. But these physicians say, "Why, you are living altogether different from what you ought to live. You ought not to be on this ground. You must live differently and eat differently." And so they are leading right away from the path that God has been leading His people in all the way through.
